Module org.example.proyecto
Package org.example.proyecto.model.booking

Class BookingDB

java.lang.Object
org.example.proyecto.model.booking.BookingDB
All Implemented Interfaces:
BookingDAO
public class BookingDB extends Object implements BookingDAO
Implementation of the BookingDAO interface for accessing and manipulating booking data in the database. This class uses JDBC for database operations.
Since:
2024-05-28
